parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes the magazine from the turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret.

Note: you may create invalid combinations by using this function. When doing so, application behaviour is undefined.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''removeMagazineTurret''' [magazineName, turretPath]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [weaponName, turretPath]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>vehicle player '''removeMagazineTurret''' ["60rnd_cmflaremagazine",[-1]]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_tank '''removeMagazineTurret''' ["20Rnd_120mmSABOT_M1A2",[0]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazineTurret]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
